description: Lists the SAML provider resource objects defined in IAM in the account. IAM resource-listing operations return a subset of the available attributes for the resource. For example, this operation does not return tags, even though they are an attribute of the returned object. To view all of the information for a SAML provider, see  GetSAMLProvider.

nested_items.name: SAMLProviderList
nested_items.description: The list of SAML provider resource objects defined in IAM for this Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SAML provider.

nested_items.name: ValidUntil
nested_items.description: The expiration date and time for the SAML provider.

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the SAML provider was created.
